entry.tran: (附于摩托车旁可载人的)边车，跨斗，侧车
entry.def: A sidecar is a kind of box with wheels which you can attach to the side of a motorcycle so that you can carry a passenger in it.

means.word_mean: 1. a cocktail made of orange liqueur with lemon juice and brandy
2. conveyance consisting of a small carrier attached to the side of a motorcycle
